citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on
02/29/2016. After speaking with an individual at the facility, it was relayed that no one would be available to walk
through the inspection process for the rest of the day.
